divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving to Jack in the Box to get something to eat when we noticed it upin the sky. We pulled over and got out. We looked up toward the richland skyand saw it moving north. We were in kennewick. We watched it until it was outof sight. It moved very fast. IT was like 3 V-shaped lights.
